sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.apps_hub" name="Team Development" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" type="application" licensable="true"> <description>Configure and develop ServiceNow applications in parallel across multiple instances</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.apps"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular"/> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="hub_client" class="com.snc.apps.hub.ng.NGHubClient"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="hub_server" class="com.snc.apps.hub.HubServer"/> <extension point="com.glideapp.workflow.helper" name="WorkflowHelper" class="com.glideapp.workflow.WorkflowHelper"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="HubAPI" class="com.snc.apps.hub.api.HubAPI"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PushAPI" class="com.snc.apps.hub.api.PushAPI"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="BackOutAPI" class="com.snc.apps.hub.api.BackOutAPI"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ScriptableMetadataWriter" class="com.snc.metadata.writer.ScriptableMetadataWriter"/> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Configure and develop ServiceNow applications in parallel across multiple instances</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.snc.apps_hub</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Team Development</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.apps_hub/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.apps,com.glide.ui.angular</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.apps_hub</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
